publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 127
ab.l:
Širasy ol maʿalalarnyn Šelomoɣa miźmor eǵer YWY
qondarmasa juv́ńu muftḥa zaḥḿet́ č́eǵarĺar qondaruvčulary any eǵer H saqlamasa šaharny muftḥa saḥčy saqlar any.
Muftḥa siźǵa ört́a turuvčular keč́ jatuvčular ašavčular et́ḿagiń ol qyjyn- lylarnyn alej b́eŕadir bijlikni śuv́arińa juqlejdoɣonɣa.
Muna üĺuš́u H-nyn ulanlar jaly jemišiniń qursaḥnyn.
Ńečik oḥlar qolunda baɣatyrnyn alejdir ol jigit́ eĺ.
Sandyr ol kišiǵa ki toltursa kešiń alardan ujatly bolmaslar ki syndyrdylar duš- manlarny qabaḥta.
